Title: Love Will Tear Us Apart
Actors: Tony Ka Fai Leung, Liping Lü, Ning Wong, Rolf Chow
Plot: This film gets under the skin of a very marginalized group: recent immigrants to Hong Kong from Mainland China. Belying the expectation that they will belong in a territory now returned to China's sovereignty, they find themselves lonely, frustrated, poor and employable only in the most menial jobs from elevator service staff to prostitution.
